description: Actually a pretty good selection for this month in Humble Choice with an overall set of pretty great looking games. So here's what's in it and the expected compatibility for Steam Deck and Desktop Linux.
title: Humble Choice for April has Terraformers, Victoria 3, The Callisto Protocol

description: Released into Early Access today is Of Life and Land (prev called Circle of Kerzoven), a settlement-building game from developer Marco Burri made in Godot.
title: Of Life and Land is a promising settlement-building game with rich simulation out on Steam

description: Content Warning is the latest release from Landfall Publishing (Totally Accurate Battle Simulator, Clustertruck), which seems like a mix of Lethal Company with a blend of being a YouTuber. It's also free to claim until 4PM UTC later today, April 2nd.
title: Get famous or die trying - grab Content Warning free for the next few hours

description: Thanks to all of Valve's effort with Proton, Steam Deck and their funding of people working on various other bits of Linux code like GPU drivers - the Linux share on Steam as of March 2024 bounced back to a near multi-year high.
title: Linux share on Steam bounces back to nearly 2% for March 2024

description: After all the issues with Canonical's Snap package scams lately, it seems the Flathub folks are continuing to ensure their platform is trustworthy.
title: Flathub now prominently notes unverified Flatpak apps

description: If you somehow still don't own the Fallout games, and with the Amazon series coming up, maybe this Fallout Bundle from Fanatical might be a good time for you to dive in.
title: Get a whole lot of Fallout games in this Fanatical bundle

description: Another month down and Valve have released the list of what was popular on Steam Deck for March 2024.
title: Here's the most played Steam Deck games from March 2024

description: The Heroic Games Launcher version 2.14.0 has been released and with it some category customisation improvements, to make them easier to work with. Along with fixes for their GOG and Amazon integrations and plenty more.
title: Heroic Games Launcher v2.14 has GOG and Amazon fixes, category customization improvements

description: It's free, open source and full of features. Widelands, a game inspired by The Settlers II, has a big new release out now with version 1.2.
title: Free Settlers II inspired strategy game Widelands version 1.2 is out now
